thread.title_full: Shocking moment a pet dog is eaten by a CROCODILE | Daily Mail Online

author: Abe Hawken For Mailonline
title: Shocking moment a pet dog is eaten by a CROCODILE | Daily Mail Online
text: comments This is the shocking moment a family watched on in horror as their pet dog was snatched and eaten alive by a crocodile. A man could be seen throwing a rope around the reptile as it was swimming in a river in Mexico. But seconds later, a naive dog approached the animal and it quickly used its jaws to grab hold of it. The giant reptile (left) was spotted in a shallow river in Mexico and seconds later a helpless dog approached it Its stunned owners watched the crocodile retreat back into the water with the pet in its huge mouth. A child could be heard screaming and crying after witnessing the helpless pet being taken away. RELATED ARTICLES
